parameters: Someone has... has blown up my office!
Wait, hold the phone, I thought you were the most
powerful person here outside of Jack! If you didn't want
your office blown up, you probably could stop it from
Yes, yes. That's usually how it works. So the fact that
It's the only explanation. Jack, you're more powerful
than I am, and if this person has already-
\c[18]HI THERE, JACK! DID YOU MISS ME?
\c[18]WHO DID YOU EXPECT? I TOLD YOU BEFORE THAT
I'M ALWAYS HERE. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF ME!!
\c[18]\a[c]FINALLY, I AM IN CONTROL OF WIRELAND! AND THERE IS
NOTHING YOU OR YOUR LITTLE FRIENDS CAN DO TO

\Shake\c[18]FINALLY! I AM IN CONTROL OF WIRELAND! AND
THERE IS
Anti, why? Why are you doing this??
Looks like we're not going to get an explanation.
Jack, I... I don't know what to do. You have to help me!
If he takes over Wireland, we're finished. All your games,
everyone here. They're all gone. Forever!
Please, calm down. Of course I'll help you, Mack. I can't
just leave Wireland defenseless, not after everything
Thank you. Thank you so much.
U-umm... look around. Maybe he left a clue as to where
he is or how he's doing this or where he'll strike next.
Well, now everyone's dispersed... I've never actually
investigated a crime scene. I wouldn't even know
Don't worry about that. I called in the best of the best.
Hello. My name is Connor. I am the android sent by
It... he... IT'S YOU!! MY BOY!!
You must be Jack. I was hoping to get to meet you.
Though I suppose we could have met under better
Wow. This place looks like shit.
It looks like there's been a serious disturbance. Allow me
to look around and try to find the source.
Wow, a real investigation with Connor and Hank? This is
Take a look around the room. It is possible that we might
miss something. Just have everyone tell you what they
find too and relay it to me.
The mug and the glass on the table were blown back and
smashed against the wall and on the floor. But the table
itself isn't damaged. Like... at all.
Yeah. And what's more, if the console had been blown
back by the explosion, why isn't the table dented or
anything where the console hit it?
Yeah. It's almost like the console blocked it from being
damaged, but you'd think getting hit with it would make
If the console was blown back onto the table, why doesn't
the table have a scratch on it?
What are you looking at over here?
The window on the door. It's not quite right.
Hmm... Uhh, c'mon outside the office.
So what am I looking at?
The glass from the door. It's all over the place here. But
Well yeah, it probably shattered with the explosion.
No, I don't think so. No ash on them. No ash on the door.
Wait... could he have done that to look like a break-in?
I guess that makes sense but... that means he got in
another way and smashed the glass from the inside.
Why go to that trouble and then reveal yourself right
away? If someone broke in, it could be anyone, but I
mean... he made it pretty clear it was him.
Well thanks, that was really useful.
It was nothing, really. Just noticed it, that's all.
Why would Anti break the glass here to make it look like
a break-in and then reveal himself later?
So what do you think could have happened in here?
I'm not sure. Just looking at this control panel, it seems
Well... I'm not a detective but I noticed that the control
panel is broken rather cleanly. Like someone cut it with
something. And if it was that close to the explosion, there
would be ash on it, right?
That's a keen observation. You think Anti might have
moved the panel before setting off the bomb?
I really don't know what to think. I mean I love mystery
games, but they're about as close as I've been to a real
Well yeah but I think it's a good observation anyway.
It looks like someone might have broken the control
panel and placed it before the explosion. But why would
Yeah. Was there anything in this office by the window?
Some candles, a plush frog, and lawbooks. Why do you
I saw indentations on the edge of the carpet. And that's
not the kinda shit Anti'd be interested in so he must've
pushed it out the window or it got blown out by the
Something was here but it either got stolen or blown out
I'm still checking out the center of the explosion. I'll let
you know if I find anything.
So have you found any clues?
I'm sorry... I don't see anything useful. But maybe I'm
Jack... why do you think Anti would do this?
I have no idea. He's acting weird, even for him.
He usually works in the shadows. Not right out in the
open blowing up offices. Actually, how do egos get here?
They're not part of a game.
Well, much like you influence canon, your community
has a small influence on canon here too. It's sort of the
same process by which Billy came to be... himself.
Enough attention and they just materialise here. Well, it's
more complicated than that. Since they're sort of alter
egos of yourself, characters you play, and I'm basically
you here, they come directly from me.
From you? Like... out of you?
No, nothing gross! Just a part of me becomes them. Like
if you cut off a lizard's tail and it grows back. Except
the tail grows a new lizard. Actually, that's not the best
I get what you're saying. They're part of you, but like...
not attached to you. Like you're their dad!
Wait, if that's the case, how come you can't control Anti?
Did you always obey your parents every time they told
One more thing I want to know: if, other than me, you're
the most powerful person here, the one who sets
everything right and cleans stuff up, how is Anti doing all
I don't know. I mean, I thought the egos didn't have my
abilities, but maybe they just never tried them out. Or
maybe this has something to do with your community.
I have a feeling that would be important to figure out.
Because if he can usurp you so easily, the other egos
might be able to do it as well.
One thing I do know: you are the ultimate authority in
this computer. Absolutely nothing and no one can
overpower you. So even if Anti becomes a foe equal
to me, he's still less powerful than you.
If that's the case, why couldn't I just grab all the
hydrospersion keys and go last time I was here?
You were split. The computer went haywire trying to
figure out how to accommodate for both of you. So your
powers probably got weakened. But as Sen, you did do
quite a bit to move things around, if you recall.
That's right, I did. Sorry about that.
It was no trouble. Like I said, I was just doing my job.
Well, thanks anyway. For everything you've done here.
Anti shouldn't be able to overpower me. How is he doing
That's what I'm going to figure out.
The fridge is blown wide open. That must've been some
blast. But I don't see anything noteworthy here.
TV's broken into 3 pieces. But the window behind it is
Yeah, now I'm looking closely, there are some clean cuts
on the TV. No blast could do that. So why did Anti break
The TV looks like it was cut intentionally. But why?
I think I might have found something. Jack, it's time to
tell me what you've figured out.
From what I can tell, your clues indicate that Anti broke
in, broke the TV, broke the console and moved it to the
table, and smashed the glass on the door.
This does appear to be the blast's center. However, the
floor's damage here is inconsistent with how damage
from an explosive device would actually look.
Really? Are you saying... this wasn't actually an
No, there was some kind of explosion, albeit very
directed; the size and locations of the holes in these two
But it doesn't seem to have involved the floor even if it
appears that way at first glance. This patch was damaged
somehow and then repaired. In fact...
Ugh, I told you not to do that!
My apologies, Hank. I am just trying to get a sample.
It was clearly repaired in a hurry. And it's not made of
the same material as the floor surrounding it.
That means this is how Anti entered the room. He must
have repaired the floor when he left.
Now hold on a second. Anti can repair floors now?
That isn't very like him. After all the destruction, why
If he was trying to create a locked room mystery,
he did a horrible job covering up his escape route.
Perhaps we can follow the trail. What's under this room?
Some offices undergoing renovation. No one's been there
for a while. You think he used the empty space to his
I can't make any solid conclusions just yet. But it does
appear so. I am going to go beneath the floor to see if
the area below has any clues.
Why not just go downstairs and circle around?
They likely barricaded the door after leaving. Going this
Well I'm not jumping down there.
It would be best not to bring too many people. So Jack,
do you want to accompany me?
We should go now. Time may be of the essence.
\c[18]\a[c]YOU REALLY THINK I'D LET YOU GO?
\c[18]\a[c]YOU REALLY THOUGHT YOU COULD FUCK WITH ME AND GET
\c[18]\a[c]AND THERE'S NOTHING YOU CAN DO ABOUT IT.
